name: @creditkarma/memcached
author: Credit Karma
description: A fully featured Memcached API client, supporting both single and clustered Memcached servers through consistent hashing and failover/failure. Memcached is rewrite of nMemcached, which will be deprecated in the near future.

scripts.pretest: npm run docker:kill && npm run docker && npm run build
scripts.test: wait-on --timeout 20000 tcp:11211 tcp:11212 tcp:11213 && mocha --opts mocha.opts
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run release:publish
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run release:publish
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run release:publish
scripts.release:prepatch: npm version prepatch && npm run release:publish
scripts.release:preminor: npm version preminor && npm run release:publish
scripts.release:premajor: npm version premajor && npm run release:publish
scripts.release:prerelease: npm version prerelease && npm run release:publish
